definition: every two months, occurring every two months, a periodical that is published twice a month or every two months (either 24 or 6 issues per year)
details:
adverb
- every two months
= example: every two months
- twice a month
= synonyms: semimonthly
adjective
- occurring every two months
= example: occurring every two months
= synonyms: bimestrial
- occurring twice a month
= synonyms: semimonthly
noun
- a periodical that is published twice a month or every two months (either 24 or 6 issues per year)
